metadata.name: Ariel The Black Mermaid #1/10
metadata.description:
"Ariel The Black Mermaid" by Crixtover Edwin

This artwork is an appreciation token to the beautiful, kind and amazing friends and family who took my birthday to heart and decided to make my dreams of a gift come true. I'm nothing more than an artist and this is my way of saying "THANK YOU" with my token of appreciation.

I hope y'all love this gift and just as Ariel's beauty brightens the ocean, I hope the same effect happens in your life moving forward. Thanks and God bless you.
